points.name: Virginia Museum of Fine Arts
points.description: Explore an impressive collection of art from around the world, including paintings, sculptures, and decorative arts, in a beautiful historic building.

points.name: Hollywood Cemetery
points.description: A historic cemetery offering scenic views of the James River and the city skyline, featuring the graves of notable figures including two U.S. Presidents.

points.name: Maymont Park
points.description: A sprawling estate with beautiful gardens, a Victorian mansion, a zoo, and picnic areas, perfect for outdoor fun and relaxation.

points.name: Virginia State Capitol
points.description: Visit the historic building designed by Thomas Jefferson, and explore the rich history of Virginia's government and architecture.

points.name: The Science Museum of Virginia
points.description: Engage with interactive exhibits, live science demonstrations, and an IMAX theater, making science fun for all ages.

points.name: Carytown
points.description: A vibrant shopping and dining district full of unique boutiques, cafes, and street art, perfect for a casual day out.

points.name: The Diamond Baseball Stadium
points.address: 3001 N. Arthur Ashe Blvd., Richmond, VA 23230
points.description: Watch a Richmond Flying Squirrels game at this lively stadium, enjoying America's favorite pastime.

points.name: Belle Isle
points.description: A scenic island park in the James River offering hiking trails, rock climbing, and stunning views of the city skyline.
